item.title: INTERACTIVE
item.heading: CUSTOM DESIGN AND DEVELOPMENT
item.desc: Floor you customers with an intuitive way to browse hi-def video, view renderings and floor plans of buildings that don't exists yet or hook it up to a custom web application that collects contact information and on the 1000th entry contacts a custom built circuit board and software that opens up a trap door in the ceiling which drops confetti on their head -- just an ...idea. Our graphic designers will take your existing collateral, renderings, brochures, and 3D models and repurpose them to suit the unique usability requirements of a touchscreen interface.
